citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:50-9:20am on 11-
FEB-22. The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, and left a message on the voicemail before departing the
facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:50-9:20am on 11-
FEB-22.  The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, and left a message on the voicemail before departing the 
facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
